document.full_text: alex rodriguez hit in the batting cages. he threw long toss. he played catch and fielded ground balls at third base. he did everything tuesday except find a place in the starting lineup against the toronto blue jays, saying he needed another day to rest his sore right oblique muscle.
document.title: rodriguez pushes return back another day
lines_and_colors: alex rodriguez hit in the batting cages. he threw long toss. he played catch and fielded ground balls at third base. he did everything tuesday except find a place in the starting lineup against the toronto blue jays, saying he needed another day to rest his sore right oblique muscle.
